control.name: cpActive
control.description: This combobox allows you to customize the color scheme for the embedded GaugeControl.

control.name: gridControl1
control.windowcaption: Assigning GaugeControl to Grid Column and Providing Data
control.description: A GaugeControl is assigned to an unbound column as an in-place editor using the RepositoryItemAnyControl object. Values (ExtendedEditValue objects) for this editor are specified in the CustomUnboundColumnData event handler. The ExtendedEditValue class implements three interfaces supported by the GaugeControl. These interfaces are used to customize the GaugeControl (provide a value, image color, and color scheme).
